teaser: This flu season is shaping up to be one of the worst, and our economy is bound to be affected. With a boom in gold sales over the last decade, the demand for safes and vaults has risen. Now that we know who’s been nominated for an Oscar, businesses that serve Hollywood, from florists to stylists, are gearing up for the event. Today, drones are used as a tool of war, but in a few years you may be able to buy your very own at your local Walmart. And when economic times are bad, pawn shops thrive -- but it seems now even high-end pawn shops are doing particularly well.
title: Marketplace for Thursday, January 10, 2013
byline: Jeff Tyler, John Rosman, Ethan Lindsey, Stacey Vanek Smith, Kai Ryssdal, Mark Garrison, David Gura and Steve Gardner
